So i got dragon mage to work and the game hardly if ever crashes with one exception and heres how. Windows 7 btw.

Install sacred2 from reloadeds torrent but only discs one and two do not install the third for "elite" after this use the right patch from this torrent to patch your game so that you can install ice and blood. 

install ice and blood. then use the reloaded fix for it. 

go to your appdata/local/sacred2 and delete Options.txt

put a new textfile in that folder called optionsCustom.txt and pus this in that text file

settings.usePhysHW = 0
render.d_patchPhysics = 0
video.detail_physx = 0

save that and you should be able to play full game with even dragon mage and it should rarely crash if ever.
